# kIOPropertyProductRevisionLevelKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ kIOPropertyProductRevisionLevelKey ](/documentation/driverkit/kiopropertyproductrevisionlevelkey)

-  kIOPropertyProductRevisionLevelKey 

Macro# kIOPropertyProductRevisionLevelKey

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
#define kIOPropertyProductRevisionLevelKey
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/kiopropertyproductrevisionlevelkey#Discussion)

This key is used to define the Product Revision Level for a particular device and it has an associated string.

Requirement: Mandatory

Example:



```
 
 
<dict>
   <key>Device Characteristics</key>
   <dict>
   	<key>Vendor Name</key>
   	<string>Apple</string>
   	<key>Product Name</key>
   	<string>iPod</string>
   	<key>Product Revision Level</key>
   	<string>1.0</string>
   </dict>
</dict>

```
